entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Baddeck
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:03 PM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING ENDED, Baddeck

entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Eskasoni (First Nations) 04:00 AM AST Monday 16 January 2023
Temperature: 2.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 92 %
Dewpoint: 1.0°C
Wind: NE 20 km/h gust 50 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Rain at times heavy. High 8.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Risk of freezing rain over the Highlands early this morning. Fog patches developing this morning. Amount 20 to 30 mm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 near noon. High 8. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near 7.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Fog patches. Amount 10 mm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southeast 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Temperature steady near 7. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Showers at times heavy. Temperature steady near plus 5.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy changing to showers in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the afternoon. Amount 10 mm. Wind southeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming south 30 gusting to 50 in the morning then light in the afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 5. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Monday 16 January 2023
